title: Smart Notification System
description: Implement an intelligent notification system that delivers contextual alerts and updates to users based on their preferences, activity patterns, and priority levels to improve engagement and reduce notification fatigue.
iWant: a smart notification system that sends relevant alerts based on my preferences and context
soThat: I receive timely, important information without being overwhelmed by irrelevant notifications
acceptanceCriteria: System sends notifications based on user-defined preferences and priority levels
Notifications are delivered through multiple channels (email, push, in-app)
Users can customize notification frequency and quiet hours
System tracks delivery status and user engagement metrics
Duplicate notifications are automatically filtered and consolidated
